title: FIX FOR LATE LOBBY JOINERS
body:
If you suffer from "Late Lobby Join Syndrome" and would trade your soul to call mid first, then I have the tidbit for you. 

You see, recently I discovered that you can "warm" your client up.

This can be most easily done by creating a custom game, entering its lobby, then quitting without selecting a champion. This somehow familiarizes the client with loading into lobbies, making subsequent entries faster.

Tell me if this tip helped you, I'd like to know.
